Player History
Drafted in 24th round, 384th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Jose Granados (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2015, off Kevin Nelson (MON)...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/20/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $2,970,000 per year...
Traded from Houston to New York on 2/5/2017 (Going to HOU: P Demetrio Kabas. Going to NY: SS Albert Saldaña)...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 8/15/2017.
